metadata.dc:author: Zúñiga, María Del Carmen
Bouza, María Teresa
Pampín, Francisco
Galeiras, Rita
Bou, Germán
Freire, David
metadata.dc:description: The natural habitat of the genus Aeromonas is an aquatic environment. We describe the case of a patient suffering severe traumatic brain injury and meningitis by A. hydrophyla.
metadata.dc:title: Aeromonas y meningitis: una presentación infrecuente.
[Aeromonas and meningitis: An unusual presentation].
